channel.title: KillParadise | [24/7 Uptime | Factions | Shops | mcMMO | Kits | Minigames]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://topg.org/premium/367417_8959.png[/img]
IP: mc.killparadise.us
When you start on KillParadise you're presented with a choice of what you want to do. You can test your skills in the Faction PVP world and fight or ally with other factions all while protecting your own bases. You can show off your building ability in the creative world and maybe get your builds featured at the faction spawn! You can be a peaceful player, amassing great wealth by mining and crafting and selling your goods to players with rentable shops. You can even spend your time playing Survival Games or MobArena with your friends and other server players. The possibilities are endless.
We're adding new things almost daily and great ideas are awarded with awesome items! And drop parties are a frequent event on KillParadise.
Some basic features of the server: - 15000x15000 Faction world! Plenty of room to grow and expand your faction into one of the most powerful factions on the server. - Multiple minigames including Survival Games, MobArena, Spleef, Parkour, and more! - A free-build plot based creative world that is accessible for free even to guests! - Free upgrade to the member rank when you register on our website! - Rentable shops that you can sell/buy items to and from other players! - Extensive server shops that allow you to buy basic items for low prices to build your base! - Voting will award you $15000 every day you vote on all links! - The End and the Nether are ENABLED!! - Amazing perks for donating to the server!! - FairPVP arena where you can fight with your friends without worrying about losing items or someone beating you because they have better items! Skill only! - mcMMO to fight monsters better and earn special perks from mining, digging, fishing, and more! - A staff member is almost always on to keep the server friendly and hack/cheat free!
[IMG]http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1338/2013-09-19_152925_6410009.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1338/2013-09-19_152938_6410013.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1338/2013-09-19_152956_6410015.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1338/2013-09-19_153158_6410034.jpg[/img]
[img]http://cdn2.planetminecraft.com/files/resource_media/screenshot/1338/2013-09-22_053543_6426504.jpg[/img]

item.title: KillParadise | [24/7 Uptime | Factions | Shops | mcMMO | Kits | Minigames]

item.description:
@Redline014 wrote:

IP: mc.killparadise.us

When you start on KillParadise you’re presented with a choice of what you want to do. You can test your skills in the Faction PVP world and fight or ally with other factions all while protecting your own bases. You can show off your building ability in the creative world and maybe get your builds featured at the faction spawn! You can be a peaceful player, amassing great wealth by mining and crafting and selling your goods to players with rentable shops. You can even spend your time playing Survival Games or MobArena with your friends and other server players. The possibilities are endless.

We’re adding new things almost daily and great ideas are awarded with awesome items! And drop parties are a frequent event on KillParadise.

Some basic features of the server:

  • 15000x15000 Faction world! Plenty of room to grow and expand your faction into one of the most powerful factions on the server.
  • Multiple minigames including Survival Games, MobArena, Spleef, Parkour, and more!
  • A free-build plot based creative world that is accessible for free even to guests!
  • Free upgrade to the member rank when you register on our website!
  • Rentable shops that you can sell/buy items to and from other players!
  • Extensive server shops that allow you to buy basic items for low prices to build your base!
  • Voting will award you $15000 every day you vote on all links!
  • The End and the Nether are ENABLED!!
  • Amazing perks for donating to the server!!
  • FairPVP arena where you can fight with your friends without worrying about losing items or someone beating you because they have better items! Skill only!
  • mcMMO to fight monsters better and earn special perks from mining, digging, fishing, and more!
  • A staff member is almost always on to keep the server friendly and hack/cheat free!
